items.mrinfo: Join the Istanbul Half Marathon 2024 for a breathtaking run along the Bosphorus. This event brings together elite and amateur runners from all over the world for a scenic and competitive 21K experience.
Experience the magic of Central Park at dawn in the Sunrise 5K. Perfect for all skill levels, enjoy the skyline views and post-run celebration with fellow runners.
Race through the iconic streets of London in this globally recognized marathon. Thousands of runners, stunning landmarks, and electrifying crowds make this an unforgettable experience.
Dash through the dazzling lights of Tokyo in this nighttime run by the bay. A perfect blend of fitness and nightlife energy with music, lights, and adrenaline!
Start your day with the waves! Our beachside 5K run along Bondi is a perfect mix of fun, sand, and sunshine. Great for families and beginners.
Team up for the ultimate relay event in Berlin! This high-energy race encourages teamwork and speed through historic cityscapes and cheering spectators.
Immerse yourself in nature with this scenic trail run through the Black Forest. Quiet paths, fresh air, and an unforgettable wilderness adventure.
Support a cause and explore the city on foot. This family-friendly 5K walk raises funds for local shelters. Enjoy live music and food stalls after your walk!
Push your limits with this endurance event across the Sahara. A challenging yet rewarding race in the stunning desert landscape, open to ultra runners and adventurers.
Embrace the chill with our snow-packed winter run in Lapland. Ice trails, pine forests, and a true test of willpower — finish strong and warm up with hot cocoa!
